name: Norn

classFeatures.name: Second Wind
classFeatures.description: Once per short rest, regain 1d10 + fighter level HP as a bonus action (used)

classFeatures.name: Action Surge
classFeatures.description: Once per short rest, take one additional action on your turn (restored)

classFeatures.name: Improved Critical
classFeatures.description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20

classFeatures.name: Extra Attack
classFeatures.description: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

equipment.description: Heavy armor made of interlocking metal rings
A wooden shield with metal reinforcement
A well-preserved longbow, suitable for precise ranged attacks
A magical scroll that grants protection from undead creatures when used

effects.description: Advantage on saving throws against undead for 10 minutes

equipment.description: A set of worn gambling dice
Old and tarnished military medals from the Fallen Barracks
A sturdy cloak providing advantage on saving throws versus extreme weather
A detailed map of the Keep of Doom showing secret passages, some now collapsed
A silver ring stamped with the sigil of the Keep of Doom
A recovered page from the Spectral Scribe's lost journal, found beneath a toppled goblet in the Great Hall. It reads: "The heart must not pass into darkness... Elen fled with the last hope..."

equipment.item_name: Spectral Scribe's Second Lost Journal Page
equipment.description: A second recovered page from the Spectral Scribe's lost journal, found in the Great Hall among scattered papers.
A shiny silver coin found loose in the Great Hall.
A finely crafted signet ring belonging to Lord Vael, bearing his family crest. Upon inspection, the ring emanates faint protective magic and may be a key to unlocking further secrets in the keep.

effects.description: May unlock secrets in the keep

equipment.description: A small dagger encrusted with precious stones, elegant but deadly. Examination shows it bears enchantments that could aid in breaking magical bindings. Identified as an enchanted ceremonial weapon from the Vael family line. It is safely usable and may have additional minor magical properties. No curse detected.
An old book detailing the history and lineage of Lord Vael's family. Careful study reveals references to the curse and hints at hidden passages within the keep.

equipment.item_name: Sir Garran's leather journal (details his corruption, arcane circle, hidden chamber, and letter to Elara)
equipment.description: A worn leather-bound journal belonging to Sir Garran, containing his personal notes on his corruption, the arcane circle, a hidden chamber, and a letter addressed to Elara.

equipment.item_name: Tarnished Key Ring with 3 Ancient Keys
equipment.description: A tarnished key ring holding three ancient keys found in the Gaol, fitting various locked doors within the keep.
A worn journal belonging to Sergeant Ralth, containing logs and notes from the Gaol.
A small crystal that captures and plays back echoes of past events, found in the guard station desk.
A worn parchment listing the names and details of prisoners held in the Gaol.

equipment.item_name: Evidence of Elen's Passage (bootprints, blue thread)
equipment.description: Signs of Scout Elen's passage through the Guard Post, including bootprints and a fragment of blue thread.
A duty roster listing guards and shifts, with a handwritten note referencing a special prisoner held in the Gaol.

equipment.item_name: Crude Map to Forgotten Ossuary (secret passage)
equipment.description: A roughly drawn map showing a secret passage from the Guard Post to the Forgotten Ossuary.
A ring holding several crude keys used for storage lockers in the keep.
A potion found at the base of the desecrated shrine, grants temporary heroism effects when consumed.

effects.description: Grants 10 temporary hit points and advantage on attack rolls for 1 hour

equipment.description: A coffer containing several velvet pouches with gold and silver coins, and two small gemstones. The deed to a plot of land west of the village has been removed.
A slender wand crafted from polished oak, topped with a crystal that glows with arcane energy. Contains charges of Magic Missile spells.

effects.description: Cast Magic Missile (1st level) using charges

equipment.description: A pristine scroll inscribed with healing magic. When read, it restores hit points to the target.
A compact meal suitable for travel, providing nourishment for one day
A small vial of lamp oil used to fuel lanterns and lamps
A simple bedroll for sleeping outdoors
A container for holding water, essential for long journeys

ammunition.name: Ancient Arrows
ammunition.description: Arrows recovered from the skeletal archer's quiver

attacksAndSpellcasting.name: Sturdy Bow
attacksAndSpellcasting.description: A sturdy bow for ranged attacks

personality_traits: I'm always polite and respectful. I don't trust my gut feelings, so I tend to hesitate even when I should act quickly.
ideals: Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority.
bonds: I fight for those who cannot fight for themselves.
flaws: I have a hard time hiding my true feelings. My sharp tongue often gets me into trouble.

racialTraits.name: Ability Score Increase
racialTraits.description: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

racialTraits.name: Languages
racialTraits.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

backgroundFeature.name: Military Rank
backgroundFeature.description: Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority and military rank. They will defer to you if they are of a lower rank, and you can invoke your rank to exert influence over other soldiers and requisition simple equipment or horses for temporary use.
